html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-05582000-04-130,  ,  TB,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into a CONTRIBUTION AGREEMENT with the Province of NEWFOUNDLAND which provides for the implementation, on a cost-shared basis, of educational, housing and community development programs, as well as water and sewer projects, in the Inuit communities of Labrador (Hopedale, Makkovik, Nain, Postville and Rigolet), for the period beginning on April 1, 2000 and ending on March 31, 2002.
Attachments
